My son loves his new shoes! I try my best to stick to zero-drop barefoot style shoes for him, so his feet can grow properly, and because he loves to climb and needs to feel with his feet properly to climb safely. Affordability cn be a challenge, and these were reasonable enough. I was so happy to find a pair with a high-top fit, to keep more sand, mulch, etc. out of his shoes on the playgrounds.  Buying new shoes like this online is always hit or miss for quality - the last pair I spent $30 on had the stitching unraveling within days, but these are sturdy (without being less flexible or more padded) and the stitching is well done. No issues at all with the sole seal - stitching and sole being the main weak points I look for. The materials themselves are solid, the sole thick enough to protect and last without losing the zero drop foot feel he needs, and the upper being thick, sturdy, and breathable, not a flimsy fabric like some brands we've tried.  They are easy enough for my 3 year old to put on by himself, which he vastly prefers, and comfortable enough he doesn't want to take them off. I might wish they had more color options, but the high ankle-covering style was more important than letting kiddo pick fun colors, and he's quite happy with the black, which goes with everything.
I was looking for wrestling shoes and these popped up - they are not wrestling shoes but my son loves them.
Perfect fit. True to size.
Size is great but very tight on the foot area before toes but sadly missed the return window.
We love these shoes for our active six year old, great traction and hold up well

We liked the shoe, but super disappointed that less than 3 months of wear they both have a hole completely through the insole, which constantly puts green foam all over his socks. The shoes are comfortable on the feet. The sole is thin so if you are going over rougher terrain you will feel the jaggedness of every rock and groove. They flex with your feet and have a simple velcro design. If your feet are more narrow then the strap will be too large and you will not have the perfect length of the strap aesthetic, especially if you do not want the tongue of the shoe moving around too much. The stitching of the shoe can hit a bit of a rough spot if these are worn consistently, as mine have started fraying on the upper heel of the shoes.

Barefoot styled shoes like these are by FAR the way to go for kids shoes. They offer all the functionality of regular gym shoes, except much more comfortable for little feet. As an adult, I'd happily wear these too. The foot positions in these are natural for the foot, and I've never had any of my kids complain of blisters or being uncomfortable in these like they will with other shoe styles. There is good flexibility in the sole, and when exceptionally dirty, have cleaned up easily.

评论概述: Best fit without socks, helped my sons knee pain went away.
评论详情: My son had been complaining regularly about his knees hurting him. I thought maybe it was the shoes he was wearing so I ordered him these. I haven't noticed any bad smells coming from them even with being worn without socks. They are holding up pretty well for how much he wears them.

My little guy loves these. Super comfy, they fit true to size. Easy to care for and comfortable for all day wear.

评论概述: My 6 year old loves these barefoot style shoes!
评论详情: I got these KUBUA Kids High Top Barefoot Shoes for my 6 year old son because I noticed he was wanting to be barefoot all the time and his shoes were smooshing his feet. After wearing once to school, he loves them so much that he takes them over his favorite cartoon character shoes every day. He says they make him feel the ground's bumps and it is neat. He also thinks it makes him run faster like a ninja haha. I am not sure about all that but glad he find them comfortable enough to wear them everyday to school.  As for sizing, I went with a size 3 in big kids but they seem to run about a 1/2 size larger roughly than his other shoes. The shoes hug a bit so this doesn't seem to affect him and allows for plenty of room to grow. At the same time the toe box is wider than usual which help his toes spread out for better balance and are more anatomical. He can put them on and take them off easily but they stay on while running and playing.  The shoes are flexible and contour to the different textures of the ground you're walking on. Overall, super happy with these and would get again when he grows out of these especially if they are on sale since they are on the more expensive side for kids shoes. I will update with how long they last.
Appearance and fit are great. My grandson loves them. He put them on right away.
My kiddo says these are the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn. They're made well, easy to get on and off thanks to the velcro closure, and they looks nice and pretty unique as well.

these are as nice as wearing normal shoes. i actually got them for myself since i have smaller feet, and i really like these barefoot shoes. they look cute, feel great and fit really well. i'm happy with this purchase.

These are very comfortabke shoes. Easy to get on and off. They have mesh material on top and if they get wet your socks will to. They are soft and flexible shoes much like wrestling shoes. Not a ton of support.

My 9 year old wears these. He likes them from what I can tell. Quality is not bad either. Very light weight, not all season wear. Basically more durable water shoes. Shoe is wide so your toes are not tight.
I'm an old man LOL so the style don't turn me on but my grandson loves them. They fit him good and seem to be well made

My toddler loves these for outdoor activities. They look like serious business. The quality is good and the ties are just stretchy, so it's easy for my little one to take them on and off himself. He also has a vendetta against socks, so he loves not needing them, and having the freedom to just in puddles without care.
These are super cute. The sole /grip is great quality they fit well.

These shoes are very flexible, which you can see in my photos. They don’t have a bunch of padding in them, but they do have good grip. The sole is made of a harder rubber, not that soft Styrofoam type that seems to be so popular now. They Velcro, so they are easy for my kids to take off and put on. I think that if you have a kid who prefers to be barefoot, but needs to wear shoes, these are a nice middle of the road shoe. I do think that they are a bit expensive at $39.99 though.
My feet feel so much better with wearing these

I really love the sensory I get from these shoes. This isn’t medical advice but as a person with low vision it’s nice to have your preferences met within your footwear choices. There’s wonderfully placed soft bumpy dots on the inside which add a relaxing sensation to your feet so they don’t get sore from the barefoot lifestyle so quickly. I love that I can feel where the edge of a step is. These shoes have flexibility which aligns with the dexterity of your own feet. Your toes are protected really well by the bumpers build into the soles. The soles also have such good traction that you’ll almost stop on contact when you’re ready to stop running. The ankle has wonderful padding as well which is one of my favourite features about these shoes.
super cute and super comfy - baby didn't make a fuss so you know that's a good sign :) love the design

So far, the child has said it's comfortable to wear. It looks comfortable and feels like it molds well to his feet, the shoe almost looks like slippers. It's pricey or compares to other brand name sneakers so I want to see how long the velcro lasts because of my child's shoes break down without 6 months of use.
These shoes were easy for my 7 yr old to put on himself.  Said they were very comfortable with out socks.  Fit as expected

I got these for my 4yo son and he absolutely loves them!  The toe box is wide and gives plenty of room for his toes to spread out, AKA "barefoot" style.  The sole is incredibly grippy.  The fabric is high-quality and the velcro holds well.  It's not hard to get my son to put his shoes on now because he loves these so much!

评论概述: My kid calls them ninja shoes
评论详情: My son loves these. He loves that the sole is thin and sticking. He likes the simple Velcro at top. He loves the style.  The material quality is good. The glue and stitch seem good. The velcro strap is good quality and so is the loop.  The soles are quite thin which also for more flexibly and ground feel, but it comes at the cost of easier punctures and quicker wearing.  The sizing is a bit large. If your kid is a perfect sized 1, these are somewhere between 1-1.5. Not a huge difference and the sizing if favorable for foot growth.  Overall a good shoe that my son loves.

I was a little nervous getting “barefoot” shoes for my son, but he really likes these! He has very wide feet but says that he likes these and that they’re super comfortable for him. I like that there are no real laces, just the elastic and velcro, so they’re quick and easy on and off, and I don’t have to worry about him not tying his shoes and tripping. He is also a big fan of the pattern. These shoes seem to dry quickly which is important during “mud season” in NJ!
